nodes.text: Croci was the language of the Crocin species. The Crocin Karjj spoke in Croci while playing sabacc in the Lodge on the planet Vandor in 10 BBY.

Croci first appeared in the 2018 Anthology Series film, Solo: A Star Wars Story. It was first identified as Croci in the video "Every Language in Star Wars" which released in 2019 on the Star Wars Kids YouTube channel.
